{docbook}
<highlights>
<itemizedlist>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.JavaServices.TaxonomyService">TaxonomyService</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Include many functions which allow adding, finding, or deleting taxonomies from a node.</para>
      </listitem>
       <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.JavaServices.LinkManager">LinkManager</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Provide APIs to work with the linked node or the link included in a node.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.JavaServices.PublicationManager">PublicationManager</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Manage the content publication.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.JavaServices.WCMComposer">WCMComposer</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Get content inside the WCM product.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.JavaServices.NewFolksonomy">NewFolksonomy</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Manage all the tag and tag style. Currently it just supports adding/editing/removing Private and Public tags.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.JavaServices.ApplicationTemplateManager">ApplicationTemplateManager</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Manage dynamic groovy templates for WCM-based products.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.JavaServices.NodeFinder">NodeFinder</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Find a node with a given path.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.JavaServices.JodConverter">JodConverter</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Convert documents into different office formats.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.JavaServices.TimelineService">TimelineService</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Get all documents by time frame (day, month, year).</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.JavaServices.SiteSearchService">SiteSearchService</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Allow finding all information matching with a given keyword.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.JavaServices.SEOService">SEOService</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Provide APIs to manage SEO data of a page or a content.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.JavaServices.ManageViewService">ManageViewService</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Include many functions which allow adding, editing, deleting, and getting views.</para>
      </listitem>
</itemizedlist>
</highlights>
{docbook}
